snippet: Don’t dismiss the military unit that brings families closure.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Wil S Hylton contests report finding military unit JPAC: Joint POW/MIA Accounting Command, which is dedicated to locating and identifying remains of fallen soldiers, has become dysfunctional and is no longer cost-effective; holds his experience writing about and working with JPAC recovery teams showed him the unit provides much-needed closure for families of those who have gone missing in action.
lead_paragraph: Don’t dismiss the military unit that brings families closure.

headline.main: Missing in Action, but Not Forever
headline.print_headline: Missing in Action, but Not Forever

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
